Symptoms: fever, dry_cough, tiredness, loss_of_taste_or_smell, sore_throat, difficulty_breathing
Description: COVID-19 is an infectious disease caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
Diets: ['High-Protein Diet', 'Hydration', 'Vitamin C and D rich foods', 'Zinc supplements']
Precautions: isolate yourself, wear a mask, wash hands frequently, monitor oxygen levels

Symptoms: fatigue, weakness, pale_skin, chest_pain, cold_hands_and_feet, dizziness
Description: Anemia is a condition in which you lack enough healthy red blood cells to carry adequate oxygen to your body's tissues.
Diets: ['Iron-rich foods (spinach, red meat)', 'Vitamin C-rich foods', 'Vitamin B12 rich foods']
Precautions: consult doctor, regular blood tests, avoid tea/coffee with meals

Description: Insomnia is a common sleep disorder that can make it hard to fall asleep, hard to stay asleep, or cause you to wake up too early.
Precautions: follow stick sleep schedule, avoid screens before bed, create comfortable sleep environment

Symptoms: nausea, vomiting, watery_diarrhea, fever, abdominal_pain, stomach_cramps
Description: Food poisoning, also called foodborne illness, is caused by eating contaminated, spoiled, or toxic food.
Precautions: drink plenty of fluids, wash hands, avoid solid foods initially, rest

Description: Vitamin D deficiency can lead to loss of bone density, which can contribute to osteoporosis and fractures.
Precautions: get sunlight exposure, take supplements as prescribed, regular checkups

Description: Allergic rhinitis, or hay fever, is an allergic response to specific allergens.
Precautions: avoid allergens, use air purifiers, keep windows closed during pollen season

Symptoms: thirst, dark_yellow_urine, dry_mouth, fatigue, dizziness, confusion
Description: Dehydration occurs when you use or lose more fluid than you take in.
Precautions: drink water frequently, avoid excessive caffeine, monitor urine color
